org.apache.logging.log4j.core.pattern

Class RelativeTimePatternConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.pattern.AbstractPatternConverter
      • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.pattern.LogEventPatternConverter
        • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.pattern.RelativeTimePatternConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PatternConverter

    @Plugin(name="RelativeTimePatternConverter",
        category="Converter")
public class RelativeTimePatternConverter
extends LogEventPatternConverter
    Returns the relative time in milliseconds since JVM Startup.
